mutants.original_line: return (''.join(c * k for c, k in stack), removals)
mutants.mutated_line: return ('MUTATED'.join((c * k for (c, k) in stack)), removals)

mutants.mutated_line: return (''.join((c / k for (c, k) in stack)), removals)

mutants.mutated_line: return (''.join((c + k for (c, k) in stack)), removals)
